cmd.name: Britain chamber
cmd.description: Allows druids to gain experience by learning from more experienced allies

cmd.name: Britain Ghoul Summoning
cmd.description: Allows druids to sacrifice themselves to summon a Ghoul that drains the health of all nearby enemies for about 10 seconds
cmd.param: ReqPlr, Ritual Chamber, default, NamePlr, Ghoul Summoning, default

cmd.name: Crow Summoning
cmd.description: Allows druids to sacrifice themselves to summon a crow that remains under your control for about 4 minutes
cmd.param: ReqPlr, Ritual Chamber, default, NamePlr, Crow Summoning, default

cmd.name: Mass Heal
cmd.description: Allows druids to sacrifice themselves to distribute up to 1000 health among nearby allies.\nThe same effect also applies every time that a druid dies
cmd.param: ReqPlr, Ritual Chamber, default, NamePlr, Mass Heal, default

cmd.name: Mass Concealment
cmd.description: Allows druids to automatically hide thmeselves and your nearby warriors
cmd.param: ReqPlr, Ritual Chamber, default, NamePlr, Mass Concealment, default
